overview: "Atonement / Self-Titled: Vaccinated + Intoxicated" will take place at The Palladium in Worcester in the band's native Massachusetts, which has been the site of many memorable and iconic KILLSWITCH ENGAGE shows throughout the band's two-decade history. The event was directed by David Brodsky and Allison Woest for MyGoodEye.  "I am pleased we were able to finally pull this together," says singer Jesse Leach. "I hope everyone who watches enjoys this as much as we did making it. Aside from the music, the laughter and funny moments were an equal part of the experience. The whole package really feels like a KILLSWITCH experience and we're stoked for everyone to see and hear it."
title: Killswitch Engage: Vaccinated And Intoxicated
